info.name: PCPartPicker - Dark n Simple
info.description: Turns the website to a new dark, to make it easy for your eyes. You can also change the accent colour to whatever you want. I would also highly recommend Material Design Colours for the customize options.
info.additionalInfo: V1.1 (September 20th, 2018): ► Fixed popup module. ► Fixed left side filter/info V1.0 (September 18th, 2018): ► First release.
